name: AlmostInvisibleElectricWires2
title: Almost Invisible Electric Wires [2.0]
author: joelcutler7 (forked from DellAquila, kuxynator)
description: Make copper wires 80% transparent, 50% transparent or invisible. Red and Green wire can be Blue and Yellow, 50% transparent or invisible too. Updated for Factorio 2.0, Original by DellAquila and kuxynator.
